outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management
outputs.output_descr:
"Support to Poverty Analysis and Monitoring at Ministry of Planning and Department of Statistics: Thinking Differently 
about Poverty and the Poor". Phase II.

The project fits within an overall framework of the proposed support to the Government of Jordan in the area of poverty reduction elaborated in the annexed aide memoire (annex1). The focus of this project is on Data and Knowledge Production to support poverty reduction policy-making. The project will provide the needed technical support to develop the capacity of the Department of Statistics and the Ministry of Planning and International Cooperation in production of poverty data using multi-dimensional definitions, setting related poverty lines, poverty analysis,  and monitoring, each within their role.

project_descr:
Support to Poverty Analysis and Monitoring at Ministry of Planning and Department of Statistics: 
Thinking Differently about Poverty and the Poor
project_title: Support to Poverty Analysis and Monitoring
